    • Constructor Detail

      • Tile

        public Tile(boolean light,
            int row,
            int col,
            boolean boardIsWhite,
            Game controller)
        Constructs a Tile object
        Parameters:
        light, - whether or not the tile is light
        row - of tile on board
        col - of tile on board
        boardIsWhite - point of view board is viewed from
        controller, - the Game controller the Tile belongs to, and will redirect flow back to
